name: Aquatopia
description:
PLAYSTATION®Eye required. Aquatopia™ is an interactive virtual aquarium for your PLAYSTATION®3! Using the PLAYSTATION®Eye, interact with your salt water fish by simply moving your body. Feed them by moving your fingers and hands at the top and watch "food" fall into the aquarium. You can even customize your tank by selecting which fish to include. Just don't tap the glass! This is the first in a series of "interactive art" titles for the PLAYSTATION®Eye.
Aquatopia is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. ©2007 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.
